main.name: Emre Cosar
main.description: 6+ experience about software engineering with interest in playing and creating better software solutions.
main.bio:
6+ experience about software engineering with interest in playing and creating better software solutions. Senior Software Engineer in Elsevier. Currently helping researchers and institutions with possibly the best and fastest solutions in the market to improve open science and healthcare. Hands on experience about Spring Boot, Angular, React and AWS using the TDD approach with CI/CD pipelines. Previously full stack web and mobile(Android / iOS and backend) engineer. Strong and eager about Java and JavaScript.
Clean coder and open-source committer! Loves to build software solutions that makes a difference and/or add value. To achieve that, especially pays attention to code quality and to the process (whether the right tools and frameworks are used in the project for optimal result). Has strong communication skills and he is goal oriented.
Biking(Trek4300), Running(Vomero10) and Swimming!

education.description: Bachelor's Thesis is Ontology based issue tracking systems entegration. Common and general ontology will be designed and modelled for understanding different issue tracking systems and running in between. Also common tools and algorithms will be used for inferencing and generating graphical visualisation.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Helping institutions and professionals advance healthcare, open science and improve performance for the benefit of humanity. Creating sotfware solutions mostly rely on micro-service architecture using Spring Boot and React using the TDD approach with CI/CD pipelines running on AWS environment with all kind of features from event-based transactions to dockerize applications. Stick with self-managable teams and devops culture. Excellent communication withing teams in and outside of the company.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Engineer new technologies and frameworks for FinTech Ecosystem. Worked on mobile banking application both native Android and iOS clients, has eye-verify login option first in banking apps, and APIs. Then created micro services architectures with Spring Boot and Spring Cloud for core banking domains. Using TDD approach for unit/integration and cloud tests. Sticks with clean code principles.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Worked as a part of Web Technologies & Social Media Applications Department. Maintained www.garanti.com.tr public site and made a mobile version of it. Created Twitter and Facebook web applications that bank's customers use and enrolled campaigns over Facebook and twitter. Also was a part of team that created iGaranti(now as GarantiOne) web, facebook and mobile applications. Developed notification based Google Glass application, first in Turkey, for iGaranti mobile application. Created new products and platforms for our customers to touch in so many ways. In every aspects of application development processes; designing the architecture, creating web and backend level.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: As an intern in Gdansk/Poland for 3 months, worked at CRM based company, Netz. First business experience was about java based desktop applications and three different Android applications about viewing CRM document and tracking customer-cargo locations.
